Uses of Class
io.netty5.handler.codec.base64.Base64Dialect

  • Packages that use Base64Dialect 
    Package Description
    io.netty5.handler.codec.base64
    Encoder and decoder which transform a Base64-encoded String or ByteBuf into a decoded ByteBuf and vice versa.

    • Uses of Base64Dialect in io.netty5.handler.codec.base64
